meaningMnemonic: Using your <radical>construction</radical> <radical>power</radical> you build something great. A true <kanji>achievement</kanji> built for the achievement of making kanji learning easier!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>achievement</kanji> was made possible by <reading>こう</reading>いち, so of course this construction project is a giant statue of the man himself. What an achievement of a statue. What an achievement of an achievement.
